description: This luscious raw cheesecake is made with a creamy cashew mixture studded with fresh fruit chunks and spread over a decadent raw brownie crust.
name: Black Bottom Raw Cheesecake
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups dates, (soaked in warm water for 15 minutes)
2 cups raw cashews, (soaked in water 4 to 8 hours, drained and rinsed)
1 cup fresh berries or diced fresh fruit of choice, (plus extra for serving)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients into food processor and process until very finely chopped and crumbly. Test the mixture by pressing a bit together in your hands. If it holds together, it's ready - if not, pulse a few more times.
Lightly oil the bottom of an 8 or 9 inch springform pan. Press crust mixture into pan firmly, in an even layer.
